TopicTitle: You must use the object that is on your left hand to save a doomed spaceship.

Articles.Content: A handful of cornflakes.... I\'m not even going to try to think of something....

My chest.

Oh god.
My mom\'s kindle...

A glass half full of Sprite.

This will go well...
A cat. I don\'t think that I or that cat will survive.

My sword from Medieval Times...

MUTINY!

10 billion Mentos and a lake of coke the size of Asia. 8)

Result:
My iPad... Anyone decent at hacking?

My blanket...

Ill use it as a parachute at reentry.

A plunger.

Something useful to plug up small openings!
4 empty tea mugs... have a coffee break on the film set you are acting on.

A dare ice coffee (750ml) and some marshmallows,

I\'ll have something to toast on re-entry
My face. This\'ll go well...
T-Shirt. Not as useless as you\'d imagine. Maybe the previous sentence was wrong. :\'(
My leg, I am sure this will go well, I hope.
My knee. I know! I shall knee open the escape parachute pods!

Bunch of paper, some sort of duck tape, and a DLSR..

Any ideas?

I will hit the ship with my knee until it stops...

OW!

a penny.

wow, i am good.

Mah laptop...

WATCH ORBITER TUTORIAL VIDEOS TO FIGURE OUT HOW TO FLY SAID SHIP
right arm. Imagine how much you can do with 2 arms! Maybe eve save the ship ;P

An empty water bottle.

One Bottle of ultra purified water.

One Bottle of ultra purified water with ethane 1,2 diol.

Another Bottle of the former. Inpurified with algae. I meant to filter that.

Standing in front of the aflame reactor I *KSHHSHHHHHHH*
A book that\'s opened at the chapter 'How to land a passenger plane'. I hope the spaceship is a spaceplane and do what I\'m told by the book, replacing the word 'passenger' with 'space'.
I got a battery that is full i might be able to re-power the ship.

A visa card...

I can buy an escape pod mid-flight mayhaps..
